# Game Introduction

《Magic Essence: Ether Gems》takes place in a magical fantasy world full of mystery. The story follows a magic apprentice who, out of curiosity, uses an old wizard's powerful staff, causing a split into three spaces. Chaos ensues, and the apprentice must fix the situation. Players navigate three unique spaces, each filled with challenging puzzles that require wisdom and magic. Along the way, the apprentice collects scattered wand gems and learns important life lessons, taking responsibility and growing from the experience.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974913_505709285200903_2679159247401895384_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=85CrsnvO7LcQ7kNvgExOdov&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC9iTkYPsnCFnPoZbR8IE3FeYmUR2NrVQi36aIQiPmXiw&oe=6709049E)







# Game Features

Hand Tracking: 

use two hands and the virtual world interaction, each movement is based on the precise control of the manual hand movement, enhanced sense of substitution, further free space exploration and creation, unlimited fusion of the real world and the virtual world.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57572925_876453701072205_5464959990478947163_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vhDDdAJ7h3EQ7kNvgFFvM2c&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBLpJP-r3wr3HbUA-pzsyVz3AEstsLH4qgx_TwIJGdNeQ&oe=6708F7BA)





Triple Space Switching: 

Interactively switch between three unique spaces, large, medium, and small, bringing a wonderful puzzle-solving experience.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031493_489903903624319_2508405371511117173_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LLuAgJADhUsQ7kNvgFTAJ5V&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDsmnEIcdyKw6rjJsNc-ZvajsG-WnOcDB-RO2zxj-ZSAg&oe=67091886)





Well-designed puzzles: 

Combine observation and logical reasoning, use spatial changes and material characteristics to gradually solve complex puzzles and find the whereabouts of the gems.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031633_1211067103358585_492060069743992454_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Jh334nFHIBoQ7kNvgEBPzgm&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA46smdzmRQVo4J0m5giJ9T5WVNKnZp95mi-5PUHq0OEA&oe=6708FACC)





Magic World: 

Exquisite graphics and sound effects create a strong magical atmosphere and take you into a fantasy adventure world.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982621_1246064893231632_5741101543723584807_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qX6g-iDBJmAQ7kNvgG4CFGX&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB9CRtkA9HKLNYdzM-OJh6Xhueh7QOykaHHD4_r0TfRJA&oe=6708F9AD)





Immersive experience: 

Feel the impact of every action and decision through exquisite interactions and real physical effects.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75395589_1590077521555265_26769802947899506_n.png?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ez-g43sQXmoQ7kNvgECb2-R&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBbws8ldNV5cUoHNS3CgnuE-paEy0FgmLhSFR8j5CkMEA&oe=67090DFB)
